short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gera modelos de mensagens do WhatsApp diretamente na interface do ChatGPT

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The ChatGPT WhatsApp Template Generator extension helps users craft WhatsApp message templates in line with META's guidelines. This tool streamlines the template creation process, ensuring that messages adhere to best practices and are optimized for effective communication. With an intuitive interface integrated into ChatGPT, users can easily generate and customize templates, making it simpler to create compliant and impactful WhatsApp messages.
